content: What international sporting event, featuring both summer and winter editions, brings together thousands of athletes from around the world to compete in various disciplines every four years?

The international sporting event you're referring to is the Olympic Games. It's a major event that features both summer and winter editions, held every four years, where thousands of athletes from around the world compete in various sports disciplines. The Summer Olympics and the Winter Olympics are each hosted in different host cities, selected through a bidding process organized by the International Olympic Committee (IOC). The event promotes not only athletic competition but also international unity and friendship among participating nations.
